_comment: Curated catalog of known high-quality public domain sources

sources.notes: The Mythic and Heroic Sagas of the Kiches of Central America

tales-of-the-north-american-indians.title: Tales of the North American Indians

sources.notes: James Mooney, Bureau of American Ethnology
Complete KJV Bible - Genesis is first book

myths-and-legends-of-the-bantu.title: Myths and Legends of the Bantu

myths-and-legends-of-the-mississippi-val.title: Myths and Legends of the Mississippi Valley

sources.notes: Nag Hammadi Library - definitive scholarly edition
Definitive translation from Mandinka griot tradition
Superhuman Life of Gesar of Ling
Creation of the Gods - partial translation
Centennial survey of scholarship and translations
Loeb Classical Library translation (also includes Hesiod)
From Religion of Babylonia and Assyria
Full English translation of Inca drama - only known Native American drama
Collection of Guarani legends and creation stories
329 pages covering all major pre-Columbian traditions

samguk-yusa.title: Samguk Yusa (Memorabilia of the Three Kingdoms)

sources.notes: Sixty Folk-Tales from Exclusively Slavonic Sources
Folk Tales From the Russian - includes Baba Yaga

myths-north-american-indians.title: The Myths of the North American Indians

sources.notes: Cornell University copy - no copyright restrictions in US

oceanic-mythology.title: Oceanic Mythology (Mythology of All Races Vol. IX)

sources.notes: Full text with Melanesia section (Part II)

secret-history-mongols.title: The Secret History of the Mongols

siberian-mythology.title: Finno-Ugric and Siberian Mythology (Mythology of All Races Vol. IV)

sources.notes: Folk tales from Lapland, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania

shan-hai-jing.title: Shan Hai Jing (Classic of Mountains and Seas)

sources.notes: A Chinese Bestiary - scholarly translation with commentary
Gods and Fighting Men - covers Lebor Gabála material

zend-avesta.title: Zend Avesta (Sacred Books of the East)

sources.notes: Sacred Books of the East Vol. 4 - Vendidad (purity laws)
Sacred Books of the East Vol. 23 - Hymns to deities
Sacred Books of the East Vol. 31 - Liturgical texts

legends-of-egyptian-gods.title: Legends of the Gods: The Egyptian Texts

sources.notes: Hieroglyphic texts and translations - complete PDF
Includes History of Isis and Osiris (40+ sections)
Recited by high priests of Ife - creation, gods, sacred city

yoruba-speaking-peoples.title: The Yoruba-Speaking Peoples of the Slave Coast of West Africa

sources.notes: Detailed account of Yoruba deities and religious practices
Digital Library of India scan - complete text
Legendary Shinto tales from primary source
Laments of Isis and Nephthys - complete PDF
Hymns to the goddess Isis - multi-page HTML

codex-chimalpopoca.title: Codex Chimalpopoca (History and Mythology of the Aztecs)

sources.notes: First complete English translation including Legend of the Suns
Spanish translation by noted Peruvian author

legends-of-maui.title: Legends of Maui - A Demi-God of Polynesia

navaho-origin-myths.title: Origin Myths of the Navaho Indians

sources.notes: Sacred Books of the East Vol. 10
